item.title: Vehicles creation - 3D artist
item.description:
* { box-sizing: border-box; } .img-container-x4 { float: left; width: 25%; padding: 1px; } .img-container-x4:hover img { float: left; width: 150%; padding: 1px; } .clearfix::after { content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } Vehicles ASTROS II MK-6 Coded animation for vehicle leveling and a mechanical arm using inverse kinematics
Coded animation for vehicle’s mechanical arm using inverse kinematics
